name: Free hand-drawn illustrations in PNG and SVG
description:
50+ free illustrations by Icons8 in a hand-drawn style for your designs.


Categories:

All illustrations are available in PNG and SVG.


You can use them for free but set a link to Icons8. More about linking.


Want more high-quality, editable, and consistent graphics? Install our Figma plugin, and thousands of icons, illustrations, and photos will always be at your fingertips.


Also, try our Background remover plugin and cut out images right in Figma. It's free and can handle multiple images at once without losing quality.
